com.hotlinedrifter.model.entities.actions

Class BaseAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hotlinedrifter.model.entities.actions.BaseAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Attack, Dash, Shoot, Still, Walk

    public abstract class BaseAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Base Class Action for all existing actions.
